曀字的基本解释

曀
yì
阴沉而有风；昏暗：“雾雨天昏曀。”

曀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》於計切，去霽，影。］
(1)天阴而有风；天色阴暗。
(2)犹暗昧。
(3)遮蔽。

曀字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　曀； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页499第52
【唐韻】於計切【集韻】壹計切，?音翳。【說文】隂而風也。【爾雅·釋天】隂而風曰曀。【疏】雲風曀日光。【釋名】曀，翳也。言掩翳日光使不明也。【詩·邶風】終風且曀。　又【集韻】乙兾切，音懿。又一結切，音噎。義?同。

曀字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
曀字的起名意思

暂无。

obscure
Basic explanation of words
obscure
yì
Gloomy and windy; dim: "It's faint in fog and rain."
obscure
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" Yu Jiqie, go to Ji, shadow. ]
(1) The sky is cloudy and windy; the sky is gloomy.
(2) It's still dark.
(3) Shading.
obscure
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　曀; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 499 52
[Tang Yun] Yu Jiqie【Jiyun】One Jiqie,? Yinyi. [Said the text] Yin and wind. 【Erya·Shitian】Yin and wind said 曀. [Sparse] Clouds and winds turn sunlight. [Release name] Ye, Yi Ye. Words cover up the sun and make it unclear. 【Poetry·Bei Feng】The wind will end and the wind will be full.　 [Ji Yun] Yi Yuen Cut, Yin Yi. Another knot cut, the sound choked. Righteous? Same.
